analysis.key_quote: I am appalled at the firing or demotion of so many (50,000) federal workers many of whom have spent their lives in service to our government and have acquired specialized skill sets.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong disapproval of the firing or demotion of federal workers, highlighting their long-term service and specialized skills, which indicates a concern for the merit-based system and the loss of institutional knowledge.
